website_summaries.verdict: Flir FX has cornered the market on adaptability, but it has some major limitations that make it tough to recommend in its current state.
pros: Flir FX has free cloud storage as well as a microSD card slot
It comes with a power adapter, but has a 4-hour backup battery, too
And, you can convert it into an outdoor or action cam, thanks to optional accessories (available for an extra cost)
cons: Phantom alerts, activity log lag times and app glitches hold Flir FX back

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer warranty and customer service are TERRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: We bought four of these and three worked great. When the fourth went bad, I called customer service and they give you the TOTAL run around when you want to make a warranty claim. They make you call back with multiple different items of information and their wait hold is OVER TWENTY MINUTES. When you do get someone, their English is broken at best. Great product (when they work), but TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. Just hope you get one that works, and if it is going to break, it needs to be within the Amazon return timeframe. FLIR CUSTOMER SERVICE is TERRIBLE!
customer_reviews.author: seatsar

customer_reviews.title: terrible... even toy camera would work better.  You won't be able to setup
customer_reviews.text: you will be spending hours trying to communicate with this camera ..... and support is just unprofessional. You will need to spend an hour of filling out and being screened to connect to support to begin with. This tech DavidB came on confidently stating will resolve in 20 min. but went on for an hour.... while leaving chat room for as long as 15 min without replying. So, this is what you get. I am very familiar with an IP cameras but this is just terrible product and software that an average person can't figure out. Please do NOT buy this. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Morla

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible camera: - overheats - Power supply broke (they replaced it) - Memory card no longer works after 6 months of use, perhaps because it overheats - The Image quality is rarely HD. It goes in and out of HD quality in both day and night time modes. sometimes a reset helps. - The mobile apps drain the battery very quickly, like at 1% per 30 secs - The rapidRecap feature requires you to pay for it. - The scrolling through the history of videos is slower than desired so getting to previous day of videos takes too long. - WORST customer service ever. 1 hour delays without resolution.
customer_reviews.author: mbareh

customer_reviews.title: Worst camera and company
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera installed for just over a year. This is not good for a security camera. The time it did work I had drop outs in camera feed.Now out of warranty the battery has died. Contacted flir support ( it is terrible). Got Rajendra with the indian accent. Cant understand him at all. So flir support is worthless. Finally was told they put cheap none replacable battery in them and are not replaceable. U tube has video of how to replace battery. So flir wants you to pay 250.00 for a camera that only last a year. Will not sell you a battery. Do not buy flir products!
customer_reviews.author: John Ivers

customer_reviews.title: These cameras are garbage. Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 4 of these Flir FX indoor cameras. I purchased 3 and one crapped out on me. Just dead.. unresponsive. Had it replaced and then the replacement crapped out on me and before I could try to return it, the other 2 died. I can get one to light up and chirp, but it will not work. Such a disappointment. I had high hopes and they seem to last a month or 2, but cannot be relied upon. Trust me.. do not get these cameras. They will let you down.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This camera runs super hot.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for about 5 months, the video quality is on the low side, especially at night, no mater how you set it up it is extremely sensitive and will record basically everything. the one thing that concerns me is how hot my camera runs, it averages about 135F (56c) when I hit it with my infrared thermometer. when using the housing the battery is basically dead. so the wont be any recording during power outages. due to the extreme temps this camera runs at Im probably going to remount this camera outside its housing, probably use some flame retardant material so it doesnt wind up burning my house down .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Complete piece of crap had this for 2 years it worked fine in the beginning and then it wouldnt work because it keeps prompting for a firware update. I call support and they say if the update they do doesn't work the camera is no good anymore, the warranty is only for a year and I know why because it will work for the year and then crap out. The camera is no good? What a joke I didn't even use it that much and it automatically crapped the bed. Complete waste of 180$. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: No longer supported by Flir.
customer_reviews.text: These will not work as they have been disabled by the FCC due to a severe networking vulnerability. They cannot connect to the Flir app. No patch is available to fix the issue. From Lorex, a parent company to Flir: IMPORTANT: This product is no longer supported by Lorex. If you currently own this product, please visit our Lorex Product Update Notice for details on a replacement product. If you recently purchased this product, please return it to the retail store (or seller) you purchased it from (with proof of purchase) for a refund or store credit depending on store policy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not user fiendly - sitting in a closet
customer_reviews.text: While the quality of the video is OK, the usability of the software and the fact that you have to pay for the use of the software (which wasn't very clear) as resulted in us simply placing this in a closet. If there is an interruption with the wireless (power outage) getting it back on line you would think would be automatic but isn't. Takes remembering each time because it is not intuitive. Cannot recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Flyn' B

customer_reviews.title: FLIR FXV101 Outdoor Camera IR Function Fails at Night
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 cameras for outdoors in December 2016. I live in Texas and it's now June. My IR feature has failed on all 4 cameras due to cameras over heating. The weatherproof shroud that contains each camera and protects it from the elements does not allow any ventilation for the cameras. They are hot to the touch, and the IR shutdowns at night, when you need it most. I am worked no with the company to resolve the issue. My cameras at night a mostly worthless. The daytime picture quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Not Reliable as Security Cameras
customer_reviews.text: Agree with Dom M. and J.C. Been using these cameras for several years and have had similar issues as reported by them. I've returned several and the replacements failed after several months. I purchased them because of the name FLIR, but never again for these cameras. I strongly recommend as an owner of five of these cameras (one outside), don't waste your money and look elsewhere. As I write this review, my outside camera just went belly-up and won't even power on after several trouble shooting procedures. Now I have to deal with their Tech Support which will be a waste of my time.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Bradley

customer_reviews.title: It was ok when it works, but picture quality isn't great, and camera died after 2 years and 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine from Amazon on April 2015. It's now July 2017 and the camera is gone. It was powering itself off after a few days, and as of this morning, it was not powering on and the rear housing was bulging so much that it popped off a corner of the external casing. I suspect, much like another reviewer here, that the battery has gone bad. It's a pity the warranty is only for 1 year. For $199 I spent when this first launched, it feels like a waste of money. The picture quality was never very good, it's motion detection was a joke (it would detect light changes as motion so it was basically useless unless).
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one Flir Fx to use as light surveillance around my home. Then I purchased a second one to cover a different are. One seemed to work ok. However two are horrible! I have plenty of up and download speed, as well as plenty of data available. Yet my Flir FX's seem to drop the signal (requiring me to reset in person), half the time they do not record the events going on (large gaps, while days missing). Not really that great as a "Go Pro" replacement - you can't see what your shooting to make sure you have it lined up correctly. All in all, I wouldn't recommend this product even it were just $10. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mustangs4Us

customer_reviews.title: Rapid Recap is Dead
customer_reviews.text: I have 8 of these cameras around my house. However Lorex technology hase cancelled their back end server support for this device. So the hardwhare is awesome and the the software was awesome, now it is a piece of hardware with no software which makes it a brick.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Parker

customer_reviews.title: Flir FX is ok, but slightly bugging and could be much better with a few updates and additions like IFTTT/ IOT compatibility
customer_reviews.text: It's mostly a good little camera. From time to time it just stops recording anything and requires a reboot. The only way I know this is when I finally notice that there aren't any recent recordings. Also l'm constantly annoyed at some of the missing features. One of the big selling points is the rapid recap (it's basically a short video that shows activity recorded over some time window). Which is cool, but you only get one when you go into the app and select the times to generate one. How much cooler would it be if I could use If This, Then That to script this every day?
customer_reviews.author: Mason Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: First camera lasted about 6 months returned...and replaced...the good....video quality...the bad...the web interface...it's useless... log in drops off....motion detection mode any bug or light change will set it off. So if the wind is blowing and changes the light from the street lights it's recording. Had the cameras about 2 years.....for some reason only records in one minutes clips...activated when a guy was looking in the window of my truck parked in the driveway then stopped.....was broken into the next night..no recording on record.
customer_reviews.author: Craig B.

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage.
customer_reviews.text: The battery expanded and popped the case open, breaking the case. The battery was totally fried at that point and the system was toast. Total garbage. UPDATE: Still trash. The expanding battery problem is a known issue that happens after 18-24 months. It expands until the case of the camera literally breaks apart. They don't sell replacement batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Fatty Biscuits

customer_reviews.title: Crashing
customer_reviews.text: Expect to spend ALOT of time om the phone with techniclal support. I have had the units (second set) for 5 weeks. Been on the phone 9 times! Units work good WHEN they work which is not often. Recap freezes, units go off line. Not fun when they are 2 stories off the ground. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Lorex does not support these cameras
customer_reviews.text: These cameras are a pain to run and keep running. Lorex USED to have good service, but now has decided not to support these FX cameras. I can't believe it! I have $1250 (5) of them. I wont be buying from Lorex again.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Cool cameras and Great tool for DIY Home Security
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a few of these now. But don't buy USED. As tempting as a few dollars cheaper may seem, something is not right trying to calibrate the app to your network to your phone etc. I even got a kit without a power cord. Amazon. Step up your game in the QC area or dont waste our time with your inspected sticker. Anyone can put on of those on a device. I actually found these cheaper as a 2 pack with 1-3 day shipping at 399.00 Amazon was not PRIME. Even the MFG website was charging TAX and 44 dollar shipping charge
customer_reviews.author: ATB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic home security camera, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera. I picked one up based on a recommendation from a good friend and I couldn't be happier with it! Nice compact design, quick and easy setup (no wires needed!), great video quality, and a really solid feature set. In particular I really like the rapid recap so I can quickly and easily see what happened over the course of a day in just a few minutes. This is aided in particular by the smart zones so I can have it start recording when the door opens but not when my cat is just padding around the living room. If you need a security camera for your home look no further this is the camera for you!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after just 2 months - NO response from tech support
customer_reviews.text: This camera worked pretty well for a couple months. Now, the camera goes "Offline" at least once a day and I have to physically hold the power button for 10 seconds to power it off and back on in order to get it to do anything. When it's on, it doesn't record anything like it's supposed to. It worked for about 2 months, and now it's useless. I'm guessing it's just a bad unit; however, I can't seem to get any support for it. FLIR technical support has been non-responsive to my emails and tickets. A very disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Clark

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: this camera has never work as intended, the app that it uses ,it is not user friendly. I have wasted so much time trying to get it to work after it ran out of free cloud space you must buy cloud space for the recap to work and for your phone app to work when your more that 500' feet away from the house nice little camera just not friendly to use
customer_reviews.author: DanielS

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere - $29 a month cloud
customer_reviews.text: What they do not tell you is that the only way to use Rapid Recap is pay $29 a month after the first month- for that price they should just give the camera away for free. The smart grid stopped working after a firmware update. I really expected more from Flir - but maybe not. They do sell over priced thermal cameras. There is no support to lookup the problem and no way of knowing how to get a new firmware update. I even attempted to do a factory reset. I would not recommened purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Very poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very poor customer service. Takes support days to reply. No one answers the phone. Unfulfilled promises to resolve recurring cloud service subscription problems. Recurring account lockouts and password resets. Camera disconnects. Completely frustrating. Too bad because product worked well until cloud subscription renewed. Support can’t even get that right. Buy elsewhere (Nest) even at greater cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 cameras died within a year. Not built to last.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I first got these operational, however they were riddled with problems making beeping noises and within a year or three cameras died. The software is really cool but the hardware is obviously poorly designed and does not last .
customer_reviews.author: VitualBuyer

customer_reviews.title: After many home security attempts, this is the winner.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this purchase. My wife and I have been looking into home security cameras with the ability to watch what's happening if we have concerns. We tried a bunch of apps and looked into other companies - all of which failed quickly or were too expensive. The FLIR cameras are perfect. Setting the camera up and connecting it to my wi-fi took five minutes. The app works perfectly. Plus, there are two great features: night vision and rapid recap. The former is great, the latter is genius - you can get a short, time stamped glimpse of the whole day in seconds. Don't delay. Buy this today.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy oberstein

customer_reviews.title: Camera sent to me is in a holding pattern for ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera sent to me is in a holding pattern for setup, blinking green. The orange button is steady but it will say that I cannot set it up because I am not the owner. I think they sent me a used/returned camera (it has no protective film on the front) and now I cannot set up the camera because someone else has already done it and used the QR code. This is highly insecure and highly unprofessional. The camera is not usable. I am giving it a one star review until this is fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Schneiderman

customer_reviews.title: Nanny Cams
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 of these cameras as nanny cams because we liked that they were wireless, had the Rapid Recap feature, and were easy to install. It worked well for a few months, but then one by one the cameras failed. The cameras died before they were even a year and a half old. And Flir customer support is a joke! Don't purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalGal

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these.
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 Cameras work out of 6. They are less than 2 years old. Batteries are bulged on all of them. No response from the Company after multiple emails and calls.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for live streaming
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed in this thing - it sounded amazing from the product description and reviews. We bought it to double as a baby monitor. The live streaming does not function on the mobile app - just sends text notifications of a movement or sound. In order to get live streaming in a browser, you must pay for a cloud subscription, which costs almost as much as the camera itself (for just one year). In a browser, the live streaming requires a refresh every 10 minutes, which is annoying. Then every 3rd refresh or so, it logs you out and makes you log back in - also annoying. I suppose it is just not meant for live streaming or baby monitoring.
customer_reviews.author: Emi Kubota

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this camera I have spent hours trying to get it to work. I paid a local IT guy and he thought it was terrible as well. He got it working for a while but then when I tried to use a booster it stopped working again. I phoned their so called support who were terrible - kept me on the phone for over an hour doing the same thing over and over and didn't achieve anything. Ultimately they said they couldn't help and I should phone someone else - a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: susan t edwards

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Safer!
customer_reviews.text: I admit that before I made the purchase I wasn’t sure if I’ll feel comfortable having a recording device in my apartment, but after reading about the camera and the app that comes with it, and the fact that you can protect your camera with a password (you can never know who else is watching...) I decided to give it a try. Works great, enables me to check that nothing bad happened at home from anywhere I want, plus the replay options are very comfortable. I wish it could be a bit cheaper but at least it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: the insert for this is terrible. I sent one back because I couldn't get ...
customer_reviews.text: Caution: this is the most difficult piece of equipment I have ever tried to set up for use. Functionality is only accessible via the mobile app! And there are no web links for help, the insert for this is terrible. I sent one back because I couldn't get the sun shade off, now I have another one that is giving me a hard time setting up. Make sue you have a lot of memory on your phone or it won't let you get far with set up.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Whitsett

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it. It stopped working after 3 monthsof ...
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy it. It stopped working after 3 monthsof use. I did everything they say to solve the issues and still it doesnt work
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: I bought these towatch my babysitters
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to watch my babysitters. But they never worked, it gave me so much stress and aggrevation trying to always trouble shoot the problems with the manufacturer. These are terrible cameras. These should not be on the market, the manufacturer is not cooperative at all. I've had to replace them 3 times and still has problems. I paid extra for a monthly server/recording fees, but when you want to pull the archive recordings every time, it says their system is down. I think the whole thing is a lemon. This product is bad, do not waste your money. Just get cctv, it's reliable and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used. Intercom doesn't work. But a great camera besides that. I watch my dog while I'm at work and it's perfect. I wish he could hear me though so he doesn't get scared.
customer_reviews.author: Lillybug

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I got one FLIR FX video camera to test it out as a security camera and was so impressed with it that I immediately purchased a second. The video quality is outstanding and I love the IR for night vision. The Recap feature really helps to look at hours of events in a minute and a half, so you don't have to labor through every event one at a time. One thing I am anxiously waiting for is the ability to view the video feeds on the website. I read somewhere that they are working on that. Once that happens, I'll be VERY happy with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Denney Fifield

customer_reviews.title: ... giving this a one star as FLIR support it's terrible. I have no longer than 3 months and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a one star as FLIR support it's terrible. I have no longer than 3 months and I cannot longer access my camera at all. The device will no longer recognize the password and will not let me in. I called customer support several time and they asked me to call another technical support number on no one answers the phone. Althought image quality it's good it does not worth the frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I received the camera today and I am happy with the outdoor housing/mounting bracket and overall build seems to be pretty good. Setup was simple on both a android based tablet and a iPhone 5. Good options for setup and everything was pretty easy overall to figure out. Got camera mounted on outside of house and set up the way I want and all is good! The wifi connection is great and transmits and records HD video no problems and is much better staying connected to wifi then other cameras I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Poor reliability. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Wifi on this thing is horrible. Storage is horrible. You can't reset the wifi without being on the network so if you look at it remotely and it disconnects for an unknown reason.. you have to actually go there to push the dang button. I wasted my money. Don't waste yours.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera. very high definition and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera with some great features What I like about this camera, compared to other security cameras I've owned in the past is all the different features it offers. Not only is the quality of the filming excellent, all the different features really allow you to fine-tune this camera to become best suited for your specific needs. Take the smartzones for instance, I can choose the exact spots where I want motion to be detected and filmed and using the rapid recap I can easily view the highlights of the day. The cloud storage is another great feature that really saves you some bucks and the night vision is absolutely phenomenal. Terrific piece of equipment with many pluses!
customer_reviews.author: Adah H

customer_reviews.title: Very Expensive Buy for Disposable Cameras
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of this camera. Image quality and angle is good for 6-12 month. After that period batteries started to swell. Gives a lot of error. Gives alarm noise frequently . You can use only its own software, you can not use 3rd party software like IP CAM Viewer pro (which is very good). Setup options limited. It was bad experience. I was very expensive for this kind of experience.
customer_reviews.author: İbrahim Doğan

customer_reviews.title: Love Flir, but this one didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I have other cameras from Flir FX, but this one wouldn't charge and stay charged. It would turn off and on. I'm upset about this, so I returned it. I'll go to Best Buy and but one there.
customer_reviews.author: Raych

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just AMAZING! every feature one could dream of. Setup took 5 minutes. Just be sure to charge the CAMERA directly using the usb cable for an hour or so, BEFORE proceeding further. Tech support, IMMEDIATE, no wait, English speaker, and they even called back to follow up! A dream!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Battery not durable and fails connection often
customer_reviews.text: Battery dont last long even plug in. Often have to reset. Loses connection often. Motion goes off a lot maybe it's picking up spirits, who knows. Would not buy again. Last about 1 yr then started to have a mind of its own, now in trash
customer_reviews.author: MQT-69

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea - too bad it doesn't work (for me)
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this camera. The specifications etc were exactly what I wanted for a remote camera to monitor my parked vehicles. However, I was unable to get the camera to connect out to the FLIR Cloud to enable remote access to it. I could connect either to its own built in hot spot, or through my router when connecting it to the router. However, it never went outside my home Comcast network (I don't have MAC or port filtering set up). I wrote to FLIR, but never received a response which was the final straw so I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and frankly was a bit worried after reading some not so great reviews. I know some people had issues with the setup but for me it went really easily. The app is absolutely great, very easy to use and beautiful visually. There are also some really cool and useful features such as the rapid recap, night vision, smart zones and alerts. All and all I am very happy with the choice I've made and would totally recommend the FLIR FX to anyone shopping around for a security camera.
customer_reviews.author: Haggai Lavie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Must have high speed and great strength WIFI to work. I like the camera and rapid recap, BUT HATE the customer service. Calling, Chating, or opening a service request is ridiculous. Every time that I have needed customer service I end up disappointed. If you have hours to be on the phone then this is the camera for you.
customer_reviews.author: PeteZ Racing LLC

customer_reviews.title: We will see
customer_reviews.text: There is a constant beep when plugged in trying to figure how to shut this off. The dash cam kit was inexpensive so thought I would try it.
customer_reviews.author: TR Stewart

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The bottom line is that I’m a happy customer. I got the camera recently and after checking all it can do I’m happy with it. Easy, intuitive and lots of functions. Recently there's been incidents in my neighborhood, people homes got broken into and surrounding cameras from other people homes helped a lot with finding the criminals. While I don't think a camera will prevent someone from breaking into your home, it'll certainly help finding the criminals. Maybe Flir can give out a sign we can hang on our door saying “This home is protected by Flir”. Couldn't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Avi Tzurel

customer_reviews.title: Clear picture of secured area
customer_reviews.text: These are small and inconspicuous in design but take a clear image even at a considerable distance. Daytime colors are true. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: dmh

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Fit My Purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Was trying to use it behind a window. Infrared light reflected off window blinding the camera. Also was unable to retrieve saved videos from interweb.
customer_reviews.author: T. Havling

customer_reviews.title: Cool product, would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera to keep an eye on my 2 dogs while I'm at work. They tend to get in to all sorts of trouble when they're on their own and I've been trying to figure out which one of the 2 is the main instigator. Setting up the camera was easy and I immediately used the app to define smartzones and motion detection. Sure enough it started filming when they started going through the kitchen trash. The thing that I liked is that I got a notification when motion was detected and I could command them to stop using the intercom- very cool!
customer_reviews.author: A&M

customer_reviews.title: 2 cameras, none of which worked.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two cameras. One of which never turned on after hours of charging, both stand and camera, attached and separately. The second camera did power on, however, only took a charged with USB charger was directly connected to camera, the base would not take a charge. Don't waste your time or money!
customer_reviews.author: Nick T

customer_reviews.title: Very unreliable - drops off line, requiring hard reset
customer_reviews.text: Very inconsistent performance. Would drop off line randomly and require physically pulling camera out of housing and resetting. So glad I didn't mount them before figuring this out.
customer_reviews.author: Dave R.

customer_reviews.title: Dashboard camera by day sports camera by night
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazingly versatile, I know most people use it as a security camera but it can be much more. I for one use it primarily as a dashboard camera and have it mounted with the dashboard accessory. I also had the chance to play around with it as a sports camera during a recent hockey game I participated in. I LOVE this camera for both functionalities! Setting it up was easy, the quality is amazing and there is plenty of storage. The rapid recap feature is a very cool way of making short clips of all your action filled moments. I am very happy with my purchase and feel like it totally deserves my 5 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Rose L.

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this camera for about a week but so far I’m very pleased with it. It’s high quality and uses Rapid Recap (superimposing pictures one on top of another). Pros Smooth looking camera Spectacular image quality Wide angle that does not distort Temperature and humidity sensors Indoor and outdoor use (with appropriate casing) Security oriented app Rapid Recap (as I mentioned above) Able to save data locally on an SD card if need be Cons Expensive solution albeit sophisticated solution No desktop access yet, but I’m sure they’ll release a version soon
customer_reviews.author: Etis

customer_reviews.title: great for dog lovers
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. The camera is as good as any and the ability to view live footage from your phone is exactly what we were looking for. For all you dog lovers out there, this one’s for you. I set this up in my living room and my spouse and I can check in on our pooch when we’re away for school or work. We mostly see her napping on the sofa but it’s great to see she’s safe and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Nitsan

customer_reviews.title: Love the audio feature
customer_reviews.text: I am a full time working mother of 2, and this camera lets me feel at home without physically being home. With the 2-Way audio, I can talk with my kids when I have late nights at the office.
customer_reviews.author: liat

customer_reviews.title: Low resolution and cumbersome software.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is expensive and is crap. My neighbor had their car stolen and both cameras captured the thieves, one camera had a face-on view, literally five feet away with my flood light full on and the resolution is such crap the thieves look like blurry ghosts. Calling this an HD camera is ridiculous. The included software is cumbersome and not intuitive to use. I would sell the ones I have, but I feel like I'd be doing a disservice to some other soul that might actually rely on the camera in a more serious situation than a stolen car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera had a password in it and had to spend ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera had a password in it and had to spend a hour on phone waiting for a technician to tell me the reset procedure because it is not in the manual. After that was fine
customer_reviews.author: JEFFERY T.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last 2 years
customer_reviews.text: After having the camera for less than 2 years it quit working and won't power on anymore. After contacting Flir customer service, was told it was out of warranty so nothing they could do. So much for "standing behind" their product. When it worked it was OK, every now and then it would drop wifi connection. In the end, any $200 product that won't even last 2 years deserves 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: V A

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I am returning these cameras,, the night vision constantly records due to the lack of IR LEDs even when in the low sensitivity mode. They loose connectivity often even though my WIFI signal is great. The free cloud plan is limited so I went for the 99.95 a year deal only to find out that's only for one camera... Overall a total ripoff ... After talking to tech support they refunded my 99.95 even though it's past the 7 day period of order... They could not help me with the nighttime recording issues...
customer_reviews.author: Mitch H

customer_reviews.title: Great Cam!
customer_reviews.text: Excited to see this piece of technology join our family. I've been using it as a security camera looking out on my front door for a few days now so this is an initial review. Video quality is great, and the video lag is really minimal. There's not a lot of foot traffic there so I don't get false alerts at all (I guess it's an issue for some). I do like that it notifies me when someone walks in. Tried RapidRecap twice and it seems like a neat bonus to the camera, though I would have to consider if I want to buy a subscription to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Pericho

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Using it to watch the pets during the day while we are out of the house. Installation was easy and we could connect to the camera using our iPhone devices. App works smoothly and intuitive. Love the simple design of the camera. Camera is placed in the main living room and the video quality is good. Today I played a bit with the application and found the recap option. Seems like a cool feature, definitely enabling me to see what happened during the day. Not very intuitive at first glance but afterwards easily got used to using it Good product, probably will install another one at the play room
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: And the next Dropcam is...
customer_reviews.text: Had a Dropcam for a while now and was very pleased with it. Dropcam was of course discontinued and I am not very pleased with the Nest replacement. It’s just not as good. I decided to try Flir Fx instead and I’m very pleased with it. The app is simple and easy to use. The camera is just as good as the Dropcam. Now I’m debating whether I should replace my existing Dropcams. Why can’t they all just use the same app?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of my new ad-hoc security. I preferred the Flir over the competitors because it seemed more reliable than the other smart home, webcam type products out there. I am also familiar with Flir as a military solution and was surprise to see they sell products to individuals. I’ve only had it for a few days but so far I am very pleased. Installation was simple. It seems to have a strong wifi connection and it’s fairly easy to operate through the mobile app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost a great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love these in theory but the fact that it has to be plugged into an outlet (unless you want to void your warranty) make an outside install look very unprofessional which is too bad as the software features on this guy are outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Stowe

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable and annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Annoying camera, they constantly drop out of service. Great when they work, but both the website and software is really unreliable. I have purchased at least 5 and I wish I had not.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Solid camera. Video quality is great, especially on a small screen. Installation was easy pretty easy (connecting camera to phone and then connecting camera to wifi). The camera is controlled almost entirely through the app. I like that it has a free cloud subscription. That way if someone steals my camera (hope not), I’ll be able to catch the thief. Already recommended it to my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile camera but doesn't do motion triggered recordings to the SD card.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product for it's versatility. It has a mount to do it all. What it doesn't support is motion triggered video recording to the SD card. So if you wanted to catch some action activated by motion you have to have internet service and record to the cloud. I need a battery operated camera that also support motion triggered recording to local storage.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: it’s that easy. In 5 minutes I had this camera up ...
customer_reviews.text: So unbelievably simple Just got this camera. My dog could set it up, it’s that easy. In 5 minutes I had this camera up and running (+20 minutes of charging). The angle of the picture is very wide, so it’s very easy to capture the whole room even if you don’t stick it in the highest corner. My advice would be to put it somewhere where it won’t be moved that often. If you use the rapid recap feature and you move the camera, the room would come out distorted.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia K.

customer_reviews.title: Feelin at home while I'm away
customer_reviews.text: What I really love about this camera is that is allows me to interact with my home while I'm away by using it. I can choose the angles of recording, where I want motion to be detected and what exactly I want to be filmed. The intercom even gives me the option to actually be heard in my home when I'm away! As far as the quality of the image this camera is top notch and the setup was REALLY easy! I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile camera I originally intended to use this camera ...
customer_reviews.text: Great versatile camera I originally intended to use this camera for home security purposes, I had it located with a view of my back porch and was happy with it in terms of setup and quality of recordings. I decided to give it a try as a dashboard cam and moved it to my car, I actually like it even more for this use. I feel like having such high quality recordings of everything that goes on during my rides really protects me in case of false tickets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needless to say I am very disappointed in the quality of this product
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for 18months and have only been using it as a baby monitor. Today I couldn't connect to the camera and upon inspection it, will no longer power on despite being plugged into an outlet. Needless to say I am very disappointed in the quality of this product. Looks like it's time to switch to nest cam.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts 2 years went bad no replacement available. Camera stopped working
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The first one they sent me didn't work. The replacement they sent me didn't work. I gave up!
customer_reviews.author: James E. MCGUIRE

customer_reviews.title: It's ok. I ended up sticking with drop cam ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I ended up sticking with drop cam because the zoom in is much clearer, and it goes on and off when I leave the house automatically. I would never remember otherwise and defeats the purpose. Getting close though to Dropcam standards.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: to early to tell
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get camera app to work on a galaxy note 3... so I cannot tell if camera is good or works...I tried to post another review asking for help it was denied... I like the camera size and want to buy 6 more... but if the app won't work it's useless
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: A lot of features and a great price make it a great deal
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Would buy this again. The good: A lot of features and a great price make it a great deal. Easy set up and configuring. The not so bad: The iPhone app quickly drains the phone's battery while accessing the camera. Either I have ghosts or there are some false motion alerts.
customer_reviews.author: CraigW

customer_reviews.title: nice picture. No web access and no way to ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok little camera. nice picture. No web access and no way to save video on your own hard drive, you need to trust FLIR is keeping all your video secure. We all know how well that works out for the consumer in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony V.

customer_reviews.title: Saw this at my friends and had to get one of my own
customer_reviews.text: A good friend of mine has had this camera for a while and was always going on and on about the rapid recap feature. Finally I actually got to take a look at one of his rapid recap clips (through the app which is great) and I was sold. The next day I asked for credentials to play around with his camera for a while, the smart zones, the intercom and the rapid recap of course. I couldn't wait to get one of my own. Super excited and looking forward to getting it all set up!
customer_reviews.author: Matan

customer_reviews.title: This is your personal watchdog.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I knows enough people who had to deal with losing important and valuable things to theft and robbery. You can’t have a police car driving around your house all the time, and installing a security system at home is, how to say, not affordable to everyone I know. A camera with motion detection, nightvision, cloud recording and live stream, on the other hand, is affordable and super effective. You get the same effect as you would get with a super expensive security system, plus you get it with a great application. Very recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Kolarei

customer_reviews.title: Two cameras 2,000 miles apart.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have one outdoor camera in Naples FL and a second one in Venice, Italy, facing the backyard of my house. I can hear birds singing and people talking.It is just like being there. On the not so perfect side, though,it needs a lot of upload speed. I believe it needs at least 1.5 Mb upload to receive HD pictures. Also , let us know when we can use it on a PC.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended camera!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended camera! It provides a sense of security and awareness, and if you heard about maslow's hierarchy of needs - this is a pretty basic one. The camera can be accessed from anywhere, using a tablet or a mobile phone (could be nice to have a desktop version as well), the quality of the feed is great and the night vision mode works great as well, I can see everything that’s going on outside the house in the dark. I’m thinking to buy more and definitely will recommend this camera to other members of the family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Noam Engelberg

customer_reviews.title: Home Security Keeping Watchful Eye On Home
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect, good clear images, easy software to navigate settings to record. Extra expense for cloud monitoring. We now have three cameras.
customer_reviews.author: C Cox

customer_reviews.title: Best security camera I've owned I have owned several security ...
customer_reviews.text: Best security camera I've owned I have owned several security cameras in the past and always felt disappointed with them. Either the cloud storage was expensive, the connectivity problematic or the quality of filming not up to par. I decided to give the FLIR FX a chance and so far can't say I can complain. Setting it up was easy, the app is amazingly intuitive and responsive, lots of great features, free cloud storage and great quality of filming. I have finally found the security camera for me
customer_reviews.author: Chaim Dadon

customer_reviews.title: All these cameras are basically the same hardware. The ...
customer_reviews.text: All these cameras are basically the same hardware. The only difference is the software which in this case the Flir application is somewhat cumbersome and slow.
customer_reviews.author: J. cangas

customer_reviews.title: Quality control FAIL
customer_reviews.text: Bought three. Two didn't work when they arrived and the third developed a bright purple line on the image after one week of being mounted on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Maven

customer_reviews.title: Great surveillance camera
customer_reviews.text: Awesome security camera! I love the rapid review feature, it helps a lot!
customer_reviews.author: A. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Setup was easy. I got it up and running for less ...
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy. I got it up and running for less than 15 minutes. However, the software is not very good. They do not have much detail options for the notification. I received hundred if not thousand of notification a day from a low quality software. Watch out and put this in your consideration if you want to buy this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a security camera and have to say I'm really impressed with all its features and capabilities. The app is great and works really well (I have an iPhone), the rapid recap feature is absolutely amazing; practical and cool and the smart zone option makes it really easy to narrow down your camera's view to the areas that really matter to you. All and all very happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the BEST you can get!
customer_reviews.text: excellent video quality high quality audio an exceptional choice for homeowners looking for security
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Nepa

customer_reviews.title: Can’t stop watching it!
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great and all the features are super- easy to install, link to the mobile app, and the app itself is super simple to understand. The funny thing is that I can’t stop watching the video feed and creating RapidRecaps! This is such a cool feature! And I thought that watching a security camera feed would be boring boring.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Great for DIY home but if you need constant zone ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for DIY home but if you need constant zone critical CCTV then a pro system is better. Otherwise great product
customer_reviews.author: world pilot

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: Didn't charge at all, so I returned it the following day.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Marinera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera a week ago and I am really happy with it so far. I use it mainly for home monitoring and security purposes. Setting it up and connecting to the Wi-Fi was a bit of a hassle but once I figured it out it went really quickly. I like the app and some of the features are great. My favorite features are the rapid recap, the smart zone option and the intercom. To sum up I highly recommend this camera, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: zvi

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. I purchased them based on a family member's recommendation. Very sensitive even on low motion setting. Catches a lot of moths. I needed help to get it setup and had to use a range extender to get the front camera to work reliably. Once setup it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gene_CA

customer_reviews.title: Works but could use help
customer_reviews.text: It did the job, BUT the one flaw is that once the camera is in it the metal button on top hides the LED so you don't know it is recording or not.
customer_reviews.author: MR C.

product_meta.title: FLIR FX Indoor Wi-Fi Wireless 1080P HD Video Monitoring Security Camera
product_meta.description: Style:FXV101-H IndoorFLIR FX allows you to mix and match camera accessories for a variety of video monitoring applications such as outdoor security, home monitoring, recording in a vehicle, sports recording, and more. With a wide range of applications and purpose-driven features, FLIR FX is a flexible video monitoring solution that changes to suit your video monitoring needs. Please refer to the FLIRSECURE website for the Quick Start Guide.
feature_bullets: Rapid Recap compiles hours worth of activity into a short video summary. It connects you to all the day's events in a flash. See your kids coming home, your garbage being collected, your pets getting up to their usual mischief - all in an instant. Wi-Fi connectivity – as with any Wi-Fi product, Wi-Fi signal strength and reliability is very dependent on a number of factors. This includes the antenna design, product location, router location and competing Wi-Fi devices.

View live video on your smartphone or tablet in High Definition. Capture an entire room or monitor multiple points of entry with wide angle viewing, up to 160 degrees, and powerful infrared illuminators for superior night vision

Anywhere, any place: has a four-hour internal battery, and records 1080p to an included on-board micro SD card. Sports option provides waterproof, submersible housing and mounting accessories capture all the action in stunning HD

FLIR FX captures the things you can and can’t see. Sensors for temperature, humidity, sound & motion keep you informed with smart alerts & notifications. Outdoor option includes commercial-grade infrared illumination to see up to 65' at night

Easy to set up. Get direct live video streaming or FLIR Cloud connectivity on your iOS or Android devices in minutes. Integrated battery backup keeps your home or business secure even when the power goes out. Please refer the Quick Start Guide before use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.7 out of 5 stars464 ratings2.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Manufacturer: Petra Industries, Inc. - Consumer Electronics Replen
